name: Robert EDWARDS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Attorney General of Pennsylvania, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Edwards v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Robert EDWARDS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Attorney General of Pennsylvania, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of April, 2008, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

946 A.2d 103
Robert EDWARDS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Attorney General of Pennsylvania, Appellee.
